name: Sprout (itch) (hkmlt97)
description:
A small gardening prototype made in 2017 to develop some basic programming and logic skills.

Download the zip file and extract its contents to test it out! Do let me know if you come across any errors.

You can read the design documentation for this project here:  https://www.academia.edu/42080282/Sprout_-_Design_Documentation
